concept.title: About these sample documents
concept.shortdesc: These sample documents are written in DITA. They include parts of the documentation for the application.

conbody.p: Some DITA features you will see in these documents are:

ul.li: A DITA map with relationship tables
The three DITA topic types: Task, Concept, and Reference

conbody.p: To get the most out of exploring these sample files, please see the XMetaL Author DITA Evaluation Guide. This is accessible from the Help > Samples > Evaluation Guide menu item.
